title: DONKEY OF THE DAY: Man breaks into ex-girlfriend’s home, dumping ashes of child into trash
itunes:title: DONKEY OF THE DAY: Man breaks into ex-girlfriend’s home, dumping ashes of child into trash
description:
Today on the show Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to a South Carolina man for breaking into his former girlfriend’s home, damaging property and dumping the ashes of the woman’s dead child into the trash.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
